metadata.dc:author: Yábar, Alejandro
Portanova, Michel
Mena, Victor
metadata.dc:description: This report describes the characteristics of early gastric cancer surgically treated in the Gastric Cancer Unit at Rebagliati National Hospital between January 2004 and December 2008. Mean age was 68 years; males, distal location, submucosa infiltration and intestinal histological type predominate in these patients. Lymph node involvement was 13%.
metadata.dc:title: Cáncer gástrico temprano operado en el Hospital Rebagliati: estudio de 76 casos en el quinquenio 2004-2008.
[Early gastric cancer surgically treated at Rebagliati Hospital: study of 76 cases during 5 years].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de gastroenterologia del Peru : organo oficial de la Sociedad de Gastroenterologia del Peru
